trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around February 22nd 1979
divs: Sighting Detailsthe nearest thing to the sun ive seen as i live in england you will not know of failsworth were this happened i was walking home from finishing work at 5 pm in fails worth ,was a old mill which was a old cotton mill with a chimney 150 feet high which was common to see at the top of the chimney was this red brigt ball like the sun it made no noise , it was just floating as the road i was on is a long road (the old roman rd)i could see it for a long time it never moved just floated obove the chimney i got home for my mother to tell me i was late home by a hour why i dont know,after seeing friends i went to bed at 11 o clock about 4 in the morning i awoke to see my bed room light up like the sun had rose early looked out of the window to see the same red fireball traeling over a neigbours roof after that i dont know where it went after many years ive seen a silver ball near to were my perants had moved house too, about 9 years ago i was watching tv in my flat as my father was ill and i had moved to be near them the same silver ball formed over the window of the flat spilt into 3 i dont know how but it did and this is the best way i can tell you when you down load a file you see a pice of paper pass over to a file it felt as if mt brain was being read , all what they wanted to know was taken out , it left me drained it then spilt into 3 again and left as if was never thier some info the mill was a old cotton mill it was called the lawtex mill it is now been pulled down the roman rd is still thier failsworth is in the bourgh of oldham near to manchester what ide like to know is as anyother people had the same experence i have had my e mail addy is fynan59@yahoo.co.uk thanks terry
